function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 pandemic on climate crisis mitigation efforts","Impact":"Compromise of efforts to address the climate crisis","Mitigation":"Integration of climate crisis considerations into post-COVID-19 economic revival plans","Technologies":"Data analytics for tracking carbon emissions","People":"Global population, environmental activists, climate scientists","Owner":"Government organizations, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Revival of economic activity after COVID-19 crisis","Impact":"Determines the shape of economies and lives, affects carbon emissions","Mitigation":"Integration of climate crisis considerations into economic revival plans","Technologies":"Data analytics for tracking carbon emissions, sustainable technologies for economic activities","People":"Global population, policymakers, economists","Owner":"Government organizations, economic advisory groups"},{"Description":"Shift from anthropocentric worldview to ecological worldview","Impact":"Critical for framing environmental issues and inhabiting the planet","Mitigation":"Education and awareness campaigns on ecological worldview, integration of ecological principles into urban planning","Technologies":"Educational tools, urban planning software","People":"Global population, environmental educators, urban planners","Owner":"Environmental organizations, educational institutions"}]}
